General.Name: Suzhou Tianwo Science and Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: SuZhou THVOW Technology. Co., Ltd provides clean energy engineering and general contracting services in China and internationally. The company offers general contracting services for electric power engineering construction, as well as engineering design, engineering consulting, and engineering survey services; military and military-civilian special equipment and military maintenance services; and pressure vessels. The company was formerly known as Suzhou Tianwo Science and Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to SuZhou THVOW Technology. Co., Ltd in March 2015. SuZhou THVOW Technology. Co., Ltd was founded in 1998 and is based in Zhangjiagang, China. SuZhou THVOW Technology. Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Shanghai Electric Group Company Limited.

3.Name: Mr. Yu  Wang
3.Title: Exec. Deputy Gen. Mang., Sec. & Director
